interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
Review Date: 2020/07/30
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
Review Text: This will actually be my third gel kit, as the others have failed to meet my expectations. This kit is about as close as you get to salon quality. The light worked well and cured the gel polish as expected. The instructions were top notch, giving you precise directions on exactly what to do. This particular kit comes with most the items you need. The items not included are - nail file, buffer, and most importantly the actual gel color. I wasn’t able to test their polish out as I didn’t realize this didn’t come with a color. However I have other gel brands and the red I chose worked with this set. I followed the instructions using all the supplies from the kit except the color and I’m very pleased with the result. I would recommend this over other brands offered at your local general stores.
Review Title: Great instructions, don’t forget to buy the gel color.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara Black, Waterproof Natural Thick Fiber Mascara, Thick Thickening Lengthening, Dramatic Extension Voluminous Eyelashes Mascara, No Clumping, No Smudging Lasting All Day
SIKEMAY
{'Color': 'black', 'Special Feature': 'Water, Smudge Proof, Non Clumping', 'Brand': 'SIKEMAY', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof, hypoallergenic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4 x 1.1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '764690676838', 'Manufacturer': 'SIKEMAY'}
In my photo, the left side has 2 applications of peacock mascara, the right side has none at all, the difference in length is dramatic. This mascara glides on smoothly and clump free... HOWEVER, it’s stringy if that makes since, like the tiny fibers in it are extremely noticeable. (I attached a photo where even the wand itself is stringy.) The mascara doesn’t dry in a timely manner either. Five minutes after applying the mascara and it’s still not dry. I really wanted to love this mascara for the dramatic length it adds, however the quality is not what I expected.
Dramatic length. Long drying time. Stringy mess.
[Marshique] Eyelash & Eyebrow Growth Serum 0.25 Fl Oz - Oil Free Formula Essence Conditioner for Extension & Perm Treatment Care
Marshique
{'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 1.54 x 0.75 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '0000'}
The serum seems nice and was easy to apply, however there were no instructions included in the box, the box itself had no English language. I really wanted to try this product, however I can’t give you an honest review if it works because I don’t know if the product should be applied once or twice a day, before makeup or at night. Directions need to be added to the product for an honest review.
No instructions on how to use the product.
Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
{'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
This will actually be my third gel kit, as the others have failed to meet my expectations. This kit is about as close as you get to salon quality. The light worked well and cured the gel polish as expected. The instructions were top notch, giving you precise directions on exactly what to do. This particular kit comes with most the items you need. The items not included are - nail file, buffer, and most importantly the actual gel color. I wasn’t able to test their polish out as I didn’t realize this didn’t come with a color. However I have other gel brands and the red I chose worked with this set. I followed the instructions using all the supplies from the kit except the color and I’m very pleased with the result. I would recommend this over other brands offered at your local general stores.
Great instructions, don’t forget to buy the gel color.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to favor cosmetic products that enhance dramatic effects, particularly in eyelash lengthening and thickening, as well as at-home nail care kits. Their interest in waterproof and smudge-proof formulas remains evident, aligning with their desire for high-impact results.

- **Quality Expectations**: The user maintains high expectations for product quality and performance. They express significant appreciation for products with thorough instructions, noting that this enhances their ability to assess effectiveness accurately, as demonstrated in their latest review.

- **Experience Sensitivity**: The user shows sensitivity to texture and usability, seeking products that deliver results without complicating the application experience. They value usability in both cosmetic and nail care products, enhancing their overall satisfaction when instructions are clear and items meet expected quality standards.

- **Visual Feedback**: The user values visual proof of product effectiveness, preferring brands that encourage sharing experiences visually. This emphasis enables them to assess product performance more effectively.

- **Rating Trends**: The user typically offers balanced, critical reviews, often providing average ratings. Their recent feedback highlights the importance of clear instructions and inclusion of all necessary items in kits, suggesting a focus on transparency and user-friendliness in their evaluations.

In summary, the user enjoys effective, dramatic enhancement products and reliable at-home manicure options but is critical of those lacking quality results or clear application guidelines, indicating a strong desire for informative and dependable experiences.
